name: Booksmart
summary_text: On the eve of their high school graduation, two academic superstars and best friends realize they should have worked less and played more. Determined not to fall short of their peers, the girls try to cram four years of fun into one night.

name: Before the Devil Knows You're Dead
summary_text: When two brothers organize the robbery of their parents' jewelry store the job goes horribly wrong, triggering a series of events that sends them, their father and one brother's wife hurtling towards a shattering climax.

name: Enter the Dragon
summary_text: A secret agent comes to an opium lord's island fortress with other fighters for a martial-arts tournament.

name: Bedazzled
summary_text: Hopeless dweeb Elliot Richards is granted seven wishes by the Devil to snare Allison, the girl of his dreams, in exchange for his soul.

name: Anaconda
summary_text: A "National Geographic" film crew is taken hostage by an insane hunter, who forces them along on his quest to capture the world's largest - and deadliest - snake.

name: Diamonds Are Forever
summary_text: A diamond smuggling investigation leads James Bond to Las Vegas, where he uncovers an evil plot involving a rich business tycoon.

name: Jo Nesbø's Headhunters
summary_text: An accomplished headhunter risks everything to obtain a valuable painting owned by a former mercenary.

name: The Motorcycle Diaries
summary_text: The dramatization of a motorcycle road trip Che Guevara went on in his youth that showed him his life's calling.

name: Running Scared
summary_text: A low-ranking thug is entrusted by his crime boss to dispose of a gun that killed corrupt cops, but things get out of control when the gun ends up in wrong hands.

name: The Man with the Golden Gun
summary_text: James Bond is targeted by the world's most expensive assassin, while he attempts to recover sensitive solar cell technology that is being sold to the highest bidder.

name: Geostorm
summary_text: When the network of satellites designed to control the global climate starts to attack Earth, it's a race against the clock for its creator to uncover the real threat before a worldwide Geostorm wipes out everything and everyone.

name: Leap Year
summary_text: Anna Brady plans to travel to Dublin, Ireland to propose to her boyfriend Jeremy on February 29, leap day, because, according to Irish tradition, a man who receives a marriage proposal on a leap day must accept it.

name: Your Highness
summary_text: When Prince Fabious's bride is kidnapped, he goes on a quest to rescue her... accompanied by his lazy useless brother Thadeous.

name: Tango & Cash
summary_text: Framed by their ruthless arch-nemesis, a mismatched LAPD crime-fighting duo has to put its differences aside to even the score with the evil kingpin who put them behind bars once and for all.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog
summary_text: After discovering a small, blue, fast hedgehog, a small-town police officer must help him defeat an evil genius who wants to do experiments on him.

name: The Invitation
summary_text: A man accepts an invitation to a dinner party hosted by his ex-wife, an unsettling affair that reopens old wounds and creates new tensions.

name: St. Vincent
summary_text: A young boy whose parents have just divorced finds an unlikely friend and mentor in the misanthropic, bawdy, hedonistic war veteran who lives next door.

name: The Counselor
summary_text: A lawyer finds himself in over his head when he gets involved in drug trafficking.

name: Super Troopers
summary_text: Five Vermont state troopers, avid pranksters with a knack for screwing up, try to save their jobs and out-do the local police department by solving a crime.

name: Glengarry Glen Ross
summary_text: An examination of the machinations behind the scenes at a real estate office.

name: The Cloverfield Paradox
summary_text: Orbiting a planet on the brink of war, scientists test a device to solve an energy crisis, and end up face-to-face with a dark alternate reality.

name: U.S. Marshals
summary_text: U.S. Marshal Samuel Gerard and his team of Marshals are assigned to track down Sheridan, who has been accused of a double-murder.

name: Never Back Down
summary_text: A frustrated and conflicted teenager arrives at a new high school to discover an underground fight club and meet a classmate who begins to coerce him into fighting.

name: Octopussy
summary_text: A fake Fabergé egg, and a fellow Agent's death, lead James Bond to uncover an international jewel-smuggling operation, headed by the mysterious Octopussy, being used to disguise a nuclear attack on N.A.T.O. forces.

name: The Last Witch Hunter
summary_text: The last witch hunter is all that stands between humanity and the combined forces of the most horrifying witches in history.

name: Ruby Sparks
summary_text: A novelist struggling with writer's block finds romance in a most unusual way: by creating a female character he thinks will love him, then willing her into existence.

name: Den of Thieves
summary_text: An elite unit of the LA County Sheriff's Dept. and the state's most successful bank robbery crew clash as the outlaws plan a seemingly impossible heist on the Federal Reserve Bank.

name: Paper Towns
summary_text: After an all-night adventure, Quentin's lifelong crush, Margo, disappears, leaving behind clues that Quentin and his friends follow on the journey of a lifetime.

name: Inherent Vice
summary_text: In 1970, drug-fueled Los Angeles private investigator Larry "Doc" Sportello investigates the disappearance of a former girlfriend.

name: Fast Times at Ridgemont High
summary_text: A group of Southern California high school students are enjoying their most important subjects: sex, drugs, and rock n' roll.

name: License to Kill
summary_text: After capturing a drug lord, Felix Leiter is left for dead and his wife is murdered. James Bond goes rogue and seeks vengeance on those responsible, as he infiltrates an organisation posing as a hitman.

name: The Cell
summary_text: An F.B.I. Agent persuades a social worker, who is adept with a new experimental technology, to enter the mind of a comatose serial killer in order to learn where he has hidden his latest kidnap victim.

name: Alice Through the Looking Glass
summary_text: Alice returns to the whimsical world of Wonderland and travels back in time to help the Mad Hatter.

name: The Last Emperor
summary_text: The story of the final Emperor of China.

name: Good Time
summary_text: After a botched bank robbery lands his younger brother in prison, Connie Nikas embarks on a twisted odyssey through New York City's underworld to get his brother Nick out of jail.

name: Bombshell
summary_text: A group of women take on Fox News head Roger Ailes and the toxic atmosphere he presided over at the network.

name: Conan the Barbarian
summary_text: A vengeful barbarian warrior sets off to get his revenge on the evil warlord who attacked his village and murdered his father when he was a boy.

name: Volver
summary_text: After her death, a mother returns to her home town in order to fix the situations she couldn't resolve during her life.

name: It Happened One Night
summary_text: A renegade reporter and a crazy young heiress meet on a bus heading for New York, and end up stuck with each other when the bus leaves them behind at one of the stops.

name: The AristoCats
summary_text: With the help of a smooth talking tomcat, a family of Parisian felines set to inherit a fortune from their owner try to make it back home after a jealous butler kidnaps them and leaves them in the country.

name: Money Monster
summary_text: Financial TV host Lee Gates and his producer Patty are put in an extreme situation when an irate investor takes them and their crew as hostage.

name: Pet Sematary
summary_text: After tragedy strikes, a grieving father discovers an ancient burial ground behind his home with the power to raise the dead.

name: 30 Minutes or Less
summary_text: Two fledgling criminals kidnap a pizza delivery guy, strap a bomb to his chest, and inform him that he has mere hours to rob a bank or else...

name: ParaNorman
summary_text: A misunderstood boy takes on ghosts, zombies and grown-ups to save his town from a centuries-old curse.

name: The Five-Year Engagement
summary_text: One year after meeting, Tom proposes to his girlfriend, Violet, but unexpected events keep tripping them up as they look to walk down the aisle together.

name: A League of Their Own
summary_text: Two sisters join the first female professional baseball league and struggle to help it succeed amidst their own growing rivalry.

name: Insidious: Chapter 3
summary_text: A prequel set before the haunting of the Lambert family that reveals how gifted psychic Elise Rainier reluctantly agrees to use her ability to contact the dead in order to help a teenage girl who has been targeted by a dangerous supernatural entity.

name: Lady in the Water
summary_text: Apartment building superintendent Cleveland Heep rescues what he thinks is a young woman from the pool he maintains. When he discovers that she is actually a character from a bedtime story who is trying to make the journey back to her home, he works with his tenants to protect his new friend from the creatures that are determined to keep her in our world.

name: Colombiana
summary_text: A young girl in Bogotá witnesses her parents' murder and grows up to be a stone-cold assassin.

name: Zathura: A Space Adventure
summary_text: Two young brothers are drawn into an intergalactic adventure when their house is hurled through the depths of space by the magical board game they are playing.

name: Philomena
summary_text: A world-weary political journalist picks up the story of a woman's search for her son, who was taken away from her decades ago after she became pregnant and was forced to live in a convent.

name: Lockout
summary_text: A man wrongly convicted of conspiracy to commit espionage against the U.S. is offered his freedom if he can rescue the president's daughter from an outer space prison taken over by violent inmates.

name: Vacancy
summary_text: A married couple becomes stranded at an isolated motel and finds hidden video cameras in their room. They soon realize that unless they escape, they'll be the next victims of a snuff film.

name: The Warriors
summary_text: In the near future, a charismatic leader summons the street gangs of New York City in a bid to take it over. When he is killed, The Warriors are falsely blamed and now must fight their way home while every other gang is hunting them down.

name: Journey 2: The Mysterious Island
summary_text: Sean Anderson partners with his mom's husband on a mission to find his grandfather, who is thought to be missing on a mythical island.

name: Drive Angry
summary_text: A vengeful father escapes from hell and chases after the men who killed his daughter and kidnapped his granddaughter.

name: Cheaper by the Dozen
summary_text: With his wife doing a book tour, a father of twelve must handle a new job and his unstable brood.

name: eXistenZ
summary_text: A game designer on the run from assassins must play her latest virtual reality creation with a marketing trainee to determine if the game has been damaged.

name: Conspiracy Theory
summary_text: A taxi driver with a penchant for conspiracy theories becomes a target after one of these theories turns out to be true. Unfortunately, to save himself, he has to figure out which theory it is.

name: Ghost Ship
summary_text: A salvage crew discovers a long-lost 1962 passenger ship floating lifeless in a remote region of the Bering Sea, and soon notices that its long-dead inhabitants may still be on board.

name: An American Werewolf in London
summary_text: Two American college students on a walking tour of Britain are attacked by a werewolf that none of the locals will admit exists.

name: Cool Runnings
summary_text: When a Jamaican sprinter is disqualified from the Olympic Games, he enlists the help of a dishonored coach to start the first Jamaican Bobsled Team.

name: Good Night, and Good Luck.
summary_text: Broadcast journalist Edward R. Murrow looks to bring down Senator Joseph McCarthy.

name: Jingle All the Way
summary_text: A father vows to get his son a Turbo Man action figure for Christmas. However, every store is sold out of them, and he must travel all over town and compete with everybody else in order to find one.

name: The Brothers Grimsby
summary_text: A new assignment forces a top spy to team up with his football hooligan brother.

name: A Prophet
summary_text: A young Algerian man is sent to a French prison.

name: Patton
summary_text: The World War II phase of the career of controversial American general George S. Patton.

name: Ali
summary_text: A biography of sports legend Muhammad Ali, focusing on his triumphs and controversies between 1964 and 1974.

name: In the Line of Fire
summary_text: Secret Service agent Frank Horrigan (Clint Eastwood) couldn't save Kennedy, but he's determined not to let a clever assassin take out this president.

name: Paris, Texas
summary_text: Travis Henderson, an aimless drifter who has been missing for four years, wanders out of the desert and must reconnect with society, himself, his life, and his family.

name: Amour
summary_text: Georges and Anne are an octogenarian couple. They are cultivated, retired music teachers. Their daughter, also a musician, lives in Britain with her family. One day, Anne has a stroke, and the couple's bond of love is severely tested.

name: The Core
summary_text: The only way to save Earth from catastrophe is to drill down to the core and set it spinning again.

name: Jobs
summary_text: The story of Steve Jobs' ascension from college dropout into one of the most revered creative entrepreneurs of the 20th century.

name: Gremlins 2: The New Batch
summary_text: The Gremlins are back, and this time, they've taken control of a New York City media mogul's high-tech skyscraper.

name: Patriots Day
summary_text: The story of the 2013 Boston Marathon bombing and the aftermath, which includes the city-wide manhunt to find the terrorists responsible.

name: Splice
summary_text: Genetic engineers Clive Nicoli and Elsa Kast hope to achieve fame by successfully splicing together the DNA of different animals to create new hybrid animals for medical use.

name: Cellular
summary_text: A young man receives an emergency phone call on his cell phone from an older woman. The catch? The woman claims to have been kidnapped; and the kidnappers have targeted her husband and child next.

name: Lolita
summary_text: A middle-aged college professor becomes infatuated with a fourteen-year-old nymphet.

name: The Legend of Zorro
summary_text: Despite trying to keep his swashbuckling to a minimum, a threat to California's pending statehood causes the adventure-loving Don Alejandro de la Vega and his wife, Elena, to take action.

name: Elizabeth
summary_text: The early years of the reign of Elizabeth I of England and her difficult task of learning what is necessary to be a monarch.

name: The Last Boy Scout
summary_text: A private detective's protected female witness is murdered, prompting him and the victim's boyfriend to investigate the crime that leads to a corrupt politician and a crooked football team owner.

name: The Cider House Rules
summary_text: A compassionate young man, raised in an orphanage and trained to be a doctor there, decides to leave to see the world.

name: The Devil's Rejects
summary_text: The murderous, backwoods Firefly family take to the road to escape the vengeful Sheriff Wydell, who is not afraid of being as ruthless as his target.

name: Runaway Bride
summary_text: A reporter is assigned to write a story about a woman who has left a string of fiancés at the altar.

name: A Nightmare on Elm Street
summary_text: The spectre of a disfigured man haunts the children of the parents who murdered him, stalking and killing them in their dreams.

name: Crocodile Dundee
summary_text: An American reporter goes to the Australian outback to meet an eccentric crocodile poacher and invites him to New York City.

name: Anna Karenina
summary_text: In late-19th-century Russian high society, St. Petersburg aristocrat Anna Karenina enters into a life-changing affair with the dashing Count Alexei Vronsky.

name: The King
summary_text: Hal, wayward prince and heir to the English throne, is crowned King Henry V after his tyrannical father dies. Now the young king must navigate palace politics, the war his father left behind, and the emotional strings of his past life.

name: While You Were Sleeping
summary_text: A hopelessly romantic Chicago Transit Authority token collector is mistaken for the fiancée of a coma patient.

name: Babylon A.D.
summary_text: Veteran-turned-mercenary Toorop takes the high-risk job of escorting a woman from Russia to America. Little does he know that she is host to an organism that a cult wants to harvest in order to produce a genetically modified Messiah.

name: For Your Eyes Only
summary_text: James Bond is assigned to find a missing British vessel, equipped with a weapons encryption device and prevent it from falling into enemy hands.

name: Fifty Shades Darker
summary_text: While Christian wrestles with his inner demons, Anastasia must confront the anger and envy of the women who came before her.

name: The Guest
summary_text: A soldier introduces himself to the Peterson family, claiming to be a friend of their son who died in action. After the young man is welcomed into their home, a series of accidental deaths seem to be connected to his presence.

name: Reign Over Me
summary_text: A man who lost his family in the September 11 attack on New York City runs into his old college roommate. Rekindling the friendship is the one thing that appears able to help the man recover from his grief.

name: Notorious
summary_text: A woman is asked to spy on a group of Nazi friends in South America. How far will she have to go to ingratiate herself with them?

name: Letters to Juliet
summary_text: Sophie dreams of becoming a writer and travels to Verona, Italy where she meets the "Secretaries of Juliet".

name: Collateral Beauty
summary_text: Retreating from life after a tragedy, a man questions the universe by writing to Love, Time, and Death. Receiving unexpected answers, he begins to see how these things interlock and how even loss can reveal moments of meaning and beauty.

name: Year One
summary_text: After being banished from their tribe, two hunter-gatherers encounter Biblical characters and eventually wind up in the city of Sodom.

name: Instant Family
summary_text: A couple find themselves in over their heads when they foster three children.

name: Sahara
summary_text: Master explorer Dirk Pitt goes on the adventure of a lifetime of seeking out a lost Civil War battleship known as the "Ship of Death" in the deserts of West Africa while helping a WHO doctor being hounded by a ruthless dictator.

name: Boys Don't Cry
summary_text: A young man named Brandon Teena navigates love, life, and being transgender in rural Nebraska.

name: Gemini Man
summary_text: An over-the-hill hitman faces off against a younger clone of himself.

name: Home
summary_text: An alien on the run from his own people makes friends with a girl. He tries to help her on her quest, but can be an interference.

name: Three Colors: Red
summary_text: A model discovers a retired judge is keen on invading people's privacy.

name: The American
summary_text: An assassin hides out in Italy for one last assignment.

name: That's My Boy
summary_text: While in his teens, Donny fathered a son, Todd, and raised him as a single parent until Todd's 18th birthday. Now Donny resurfaces just before Todd's wedding after years apart, sending the groom-to-be's world crashing down.

name: Moonraker
summary_text: James Bond investigates the mid-air theft of a space shuttle, and discovers a plot to commit global genocide.

name: Take Shelter
summary_text: Plagued by a series of apocalyptic visions, a young husband and father questions whether to shelter his family from a coming storm, or from himself.

name: The Losers
summary_text: A CIA special forces team are betrayed and left for dead by their superiors, galvanizing them to mount an offensive on the CIA.

name: Runaway Jury
summary_text: A juror on the inside and a woman on the outside manipulate a court trial involving a major gun manufacturer.

name: Gerald's Game
summary_text: A couple tries to spice up their marriage in a remote lake house. After the husband dies unexpectedly, the wife is left handcuffed to their bed frame and must fight to survive and break free.

name: Intolerable Cruelty
summary_text: A beautiful gold digger matches wits with a shrewd Beverly Hills divorce lawyer who is increasingly attracted to her.

name: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
summary_text: Flint Lockwood now works at The Live Corp Company for his idol Chester V. But he's forced to leave his post when he learns that his most infamous machine is still operational, and is churning out menacing food-animal hybrids.

name: The Hurricane
summary_text: The story of Rubin 'Hurricane' Carter, a boxer wrongly imprisoned for murder, and the people who aided in his fight to prove his innocence.

name: Land of the Dead
summary_text: The living dead have taken over the world, and the last humans live in a walled city to protect themselves as they come to grips with the situation.

name: I Care a Lot
summary_text: A crooked legal guardian who drains the savings of her elderly wards meets her match when a woman she tries to swindle turns out to be more than she first appears.

name: Only Lovers Left Alive
summary_text: A depressed musician reunites with his lover. Though their romance, which has already endured several centuries, is disrupted by the arrival of her uncontrollable younger sister.

name: Small Soldiers
summary_text: When missile technology is used to enhance toy action figures, the toys soon begin to take their battle programming too seriously.

name: Malena
summary_text: Amidst the war climate, a teenage boy discovering himself becomes love-stricken by Malèna, a sensual woman living in a small, narrow-minded Italian town.

name: Doctor Dolittle
summary_text: A doctor discovers that he can communicate with animals.

name: The International
summary_text: An Interpol agent attempts to expose a high-profile financial institution's role in an international arms dealing ring.

name: WarGames
summary_text: A young man finds a back door into a military central computer in which reality is confused with game-playing, possibly starting World War III.

name: I Love You Phillip Morris
summary_text: A cop turns con man once he comes out of the closet. Once imprisoned, he meets the second love of his life, whom he'll stop at nothing to be with.

name: Braindead
summary_text: A young man's mother is bitten by a Sumatran rat-monkey. She gets sick and dies, at which time she comes back to life, killing and eating dogs, nurses, friends, and neighbors.

name: Do the Right Thing
summary_text: On the hottest day of the year on a street in the Bedford-Stuyvesant section of Brooklyn, everyone's hate and bigotry smolders and builds until it explodes into violence.

name: The Rite
summary_text: American seminary student Michael Kovak (Colin O'Donaghue) travels to Italy to take an exorcism course.

name: The King of Comedy
summary_text: Rupert Pupkin is a passionate yet unsuccessful comic who craves nothing more than to be in the spotlight and to achieve this, he stalks and kidnaps his idol to take the spotlight for himself.

name: To All the Boys I've Loved Before
summary_text: A teenage girl's secret love letters are exposed and wreak havoc on her love life.

name: The Ring Two
summary_text: 6 months after the incidents involving the lethal videotape, new clues prove that there is a new evil lurking in the darkness.

name: Escape Room
summary_text: Six strangers find themselves in a maze of deadly mystery rooms and must use their wits to survive.

name: Self/less
summary_text: A dying real estate mogul transfers his consciousness into a healthy young body, but soon finds that neither the procedure nor the company that performed it are quite what they seem.

name: Three Colors: Blue
summary_text: A woman struggles to find a way to live her life after the death of her husband and child.

name: DragonHeart
summary_text: The last dragon and a disillusioned dragonslaying Knight must cooperate to stop an evil King, who was given partial immortality.

name: Another Earth
summary_text: On the night of the discovery of a duplicate Earth in the Solar system, an ambitious young student and an accomplished composer cross paths in a tragic accident.

name: The Girl Who Played with Fire
summary_text: As computer hacker Lisbeth and journalist Mikael investigate a sex-trafficking ring, Lisbeth is accused of three murders, causing her to go on the run while Mikael works to clear her name.

name: Broken Arrow
summary_text: Terrorists steal nuclear warheads from the U.S. military but don't count on a pilot and park ranger spoiling their plans.

name: Funny Games
summary_text: Two psychopathic young men take a family hostage in their cabin.

name: Saw: The Final Chapter
summary_text: As a deadly battle rages over Jigsaw's brutal legacy, a group of Jigsaw survivors gathers to seek the support of self-help guru and fellow survivor Bobby Dagen, a man whose own dark secrets unleash a new wave of terror.

name: Demolition
summary_text: A successful investment banker struggles after losing his wife in a tragic car crash. With the help of a customer service rep and her young son, he starts to rebuild, beginning with the demolition of the life he once knew.

name: Dead Man
summary_text: On the run after murdering a man, accountant William Blake encounters a strange aboriginal American man named Nobody who prepares him for his journey into the spiritual world.

name: Iron Sky
summary_text: The Nazis set up a secret base on the dark side of the moon in 1945 where they hide out and plan to return to power in 2018.

name: The Experiment
summary_text: For two weeks, 20 male participants are hired to play prisoners and guards in a prison. The "prisoners" have to follow seemingly mild rules, and the "guards" are told to retain order without using physical violence.

name: Waiting...
summary_text: Young employees at Shenaniganz restaurant collectively stave off boredom and adulthood with their antics.

name: Clear and Present Danger
summary_text: CIA Analyst Jack Ryan is drawn into an illegal war fought by the US government against a Colombian drug cartel.

name: The Purge: Election Year
summary_text: Former Police Sergeant Barnes becomes head of security for Senator Charlie Roan, a Presidential candidate targeted for death on Purge night due to her vow to eliminate the Purge.

name: Election
summary_text: A high school teacher meets his match in an over-achieving student politician.

name: The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
summary_text: British retirees travel to India to take up residence in what they believe is a newly restored hotel. Less luxurious than advertised, the Marigold Hotel nevertheless slowly begins to charm in unexpected ways.

name: The Sword in the Stone
summary_text: A poor boy named Arthur learns the power of love, kindness, knowledge and bravery with the help of a wizard called Merlin in the path to become one of the most beloved kings in English history.

name: Season of the Witch
summary_text: Fourteenth century knights transport a suspected witch to a monastery, where monks deduce her powers could be the source of the Black Plague.

name: Paranormal Activity 3
summary_text: In 1988, young sisters Katie and Kristi befriend an invisible entity who resides in their home.

name: The Hot Chick
summary_text: An attractive and popular teenager, who is mean-spirited toward others, finds herself in the body of an older man, and must find a way to get back to her original body.

name: Edge of Darkness
summary_text: As homicide detective Thomas Craven investigates the murder of his activist daughter, he uncovers a corporate cover-up and government conspiracy that attracts an agent tasked with cleaning up the evidence.

name: Hereafter
summary_text: A drama centered on three people - a blue-collar American, a French journalist and a London school boy - who are touched by death in different ways.

name: Revolver
summary_text: Gambler Jake Green enters into a game with potentially deadly consequences.

name: Eat Pray Love
summary_text: A married woman realizes how unhappy her marriage really is, and that her life needs to go in a different direction. After a painful divorce, she takes off on a round-the-world journey to "find herself".

name: The Living Daylights
summary_text: James Bond is sent to investigate a KGB policy to kill all enemy spies and uncovers an arms deal that potentially has major global ramifications.

name: All About My Mother
summary_text: Young Esteban wants to become a writer and also to discover the identity of his second mother, a trans woman, carefully concealed by his mother Manuela.

name: Heathers
summary_text: At Westerburg High where cliques rule, jocks dominate and all the popular girls are named Heather, it's going to take a Veronica and mysterious new kid to give teen angst a body count.

name: You're Next
summary_text: When the Davison family comes under attack during their wedding anniversary getaway, the gang of mysterious killers soon learns that one of the victims harbors a secret talent for fighting back.

name: My Sister's Keeper
summary_text: Anna Fitzgerald looks to earn medical emancipation from her parents who until now have relied on their youngest child to help their leukemia-stricken daughter Kate remain alive.

name: A View to a Kill
summary_text: The recovery of a microchip off the body of a fellow agent leads James Bond to a mad industrialist who plans to create a worldwide microchip monopoly by destroying California's Silicon Valley.

name: The Death of Stalin
summary_text: Moscow, 1953. After being in power for nearly thirty years, Soviet dictator Joseph Vissarionovich Stalin (Adrian McLoughlin) takes ill and quickly dies. Now the members of the Council of Ministers scramble for power.

name: Mississippi Burning
summary_text: Two F.B.I. Agents with wildly different styles arrive in Mississippi to investigate the disappearance of some civil rights activists.

name: Nosferatu
summary_text: Vampire Count Orlok expresses interest in a new residence and real estate agent Hutter's wife.

name: Fantasia
summary_text: A collection of animated interpretations of great works of Western classical music.

name: Persepolis
summary_text: A precocious and outspoken Iranian girl grows up during the Islamic Revolution.

name: Bad Grandpa
summary_text: 86-year-old Irving Zisman takes a trip from Nebraska to North Carolina to take his 8 year-old grandson, Billy, back to his real father.

name: A Good Year
summary_text: A British investment broker inherits his uncle's chateau and vineyard in Provence, where he spent much of his childhood. He discovers a new laid-back lifestyle as he tries to renovate the estate to be sold.

name: Scrooged
summary_text: A selfish, cynical television executive is haunted by three spirits bearing lessons on Christmas Eve.

name: Sister Act
summary_text: When a nightclub singer is forced to take refuge from the mob in a convent, she ends up turning the convent choir into a soulful chorus complete with a Motown repertoire, until the sudden celebrity of the choir jeopardizes her identity.

name: Mr. Popper's Penguins
summary_text: The life of a businessman begins to change after he inherits six penguins, and as he transforms his apartment into a winter wonderland, his professional side starts to unravel.

name: The Spiderwick Chronicles
summary_text: Upon moving into the run-down Spiderwick Estate with their mother, twin brothers Jared and Simon Grace, along with their sister Mallory, find themselves pulled into an alternate world full of faeries and other creatures.

name: Dead Man Walking
summary_text: A nun, while comforting a convicted killer on death row, empathizes with both the killer and his victim's families.

name: The Painted Veil
summary_text: A British medical doctor fights a cholera epidemic in a small Chinese village, while being trapped at home in a loveless marriage to an unfaithful wife.

name: Widows
summary_text: Four women with nothing in common except a debt left behind by their dead husbands' criminal activities take fate into their own hands and conspire to forge a future on their own terms.

name: Blood Simple
summary_text: The owner of a seedy small-town Texas bar discovers that one of his employees is having an affair with his wife. A chaotic chain of misunderstandings, lies and mischief ensues after he devises a plot to have them murdered.

name: Dreamcatcher
summary_text: Friends on a camping trip discover that the town they're vacationing in is being plagued in an unusual fashion by parasitic aliens from outer space.

name: The Box
summary_text: A small wooden box arrives on the doorstep of a married couple, who know that opening it will grant them a million dollars and kill someone they don't know.

name: Bedtime Stories
summary_text: A hotel handyman's life changes when the lavish bedtime stories he tells his niece and nephew start to magically come true.

name: Meet the Robinsons
summary_text: Lewis is a brilliant inventor who meets mysterious stranger named Wilbur Robinson, whisking Lewis away in a time machine and together they team up to track down Bowler Hat Guy in a showdown that ends with an unexpected twist of fate.

name: Nick and Norah's Infinite Playlist
summary_text: High school student Nick O'Leary, member of the Queercore band The Jerk Offs, meets college-bound Norah Silverberg when she asks him to be her boyfriend for five minutes.

name: Grosse Pointe Blank
summary_text: Martin Blank is a professional assassin. He is sent on a mission to a small Detroit suburb, Grosse Pointe, and, by coincidence, his ten-year high school reunion party is taking place there at the same time.

name: The People vs. Larry Flynt
summary_text: The story of controversial pornography publisher Larry Flynt, and how he became a defender of free speech.

name: The X Files: I Want to Believe
summary_text: Mulder and Scully are called back to duty by the FBI when a former priest claims to be receiving psychic visions pertaining to a kidnapped agent.

name: The Pacifier
summary_text: Having recovered from wounds received in a failed rescue operation, Navy SEAL Shane Wolfe is handed a new assignment: Protect the five Plummer kids from enemies of their recently deceased father -- a government scientist whose top-secret experiment remains in the kids' house.

name: Child's Play
summary_text: A single mother gives her son a much sought-after doll for his birthday, only to discover that it is possessed by the soul of a serial killer.

name: Be Kind Rewind
summary_text: Two bumbling store clerks inadvertently erase the footage from all of the tapes in their video rental store. In order to keep the business running, they re-shoot every film in the store with their own camera, with a budget of zero dollars.

name: A Cure for Wellness
summary_text: An ambitious young executive is sent to retrieve his company's CEO from an idyllic but mysterious "wellness center" at a remote location in the Swiss Alps, but soon suspects that the spa's treatments are not what they seem.

name: The One
summary_text: A rogue Multiverse agent goes on a manhunt for alternate versions of himself, getting stronger with each kill. Only the last version of himself, an LASD cop, can stop his crusade before he becomes "The One".

name: Bring It On
summary_text: A champion high school cheerleading squad discovers its previous captain stole all their best routines from an inner-city school and must scramble to compete at this year's championships.

name: 3 Days to Kill
summary_text: A dying CIA agent trying to reconnect with his estranged daughter is offered an experimental drug that could save his life in exchange for one last assignment.

name: Bone Tomahawk
summary_text: In the dying days of the old west, an elderly sheriff and his posse set out to rescue their town's doctor from cannibalistic cave dwellers.

name: Overlord
summary_text: A small group of American soldiers find horror behind enemy lines on the eve of D-Day.

name: The Magnificent Seven
summary_text: Seven gunfighters are hired by Mexican peasants to liberate their village from oppressive bandits.

name: Beginners
summary_text: A young man is rocked by two announcements from his elderly father: that he has terminal cancer and that he has a young male lover.

name: Maleficent: Mistress of Evil
summary_text: Maleficent and her goddaughter Aurora begin to question the complex family ties that bind them as they are pulled in different directions by impending nuptials, unexpected allies and dark new forces at play.

name: Concussion
summary_text: In Pittsburgh, accomplished pathologist Dr. Bennet Omalu uncovers the truth about brain damage in football players who suffer repeated concussions in the course of normal play.

name: Hardcore Henry
summary_text: Henry is resurrected from death with no memory, and he must save his wife from a telekinetic warlord with a plan to bio-engineer soldiers.

name: Monsters
summary_text: Six years after Earth has suffered an alien invasion, a cynical journalist agrees to escort a shaken American tourist through an infected zone in Mexico to the safety of the U.S. border.

name: Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me
summary_text: Laura Palmer's harrowing final days are chronicled one year after the murder of Teresa Banks, a resident of Twin Peaks' neighboring town.

name: The Guardian
summary_text: A high school swim champion with a troubled past enrolls in the U.S. Coast Guard's "A" School, where legendary rescue swimmer Ben Randall teaches him some hard lessons about loss, love, and self-sacrifice.

name: Killers
summary_text: A vacationing woman meets her ideal man, leading to a swift marriage. Back at home, however, their idyllic life is upset when they discover their neighbors could be assassins who have been contracted to kill the couple.

name: The Muppets
summary_text: A Muppet fanatic with some help from his 2 human compatriots must regroup the Muppet gang to stop an avaricious oil mogul from taking down one of their precious life-longing treasures.

name: Following
summary_text: A young writer who follows strangers for material meets a thief who takes him under his wing.

name: Promising Young Woman
summary_text: A young woman, traumatized by a tragic event in her past, seeks out vengeance against those who crossed her path.

name: Witness
summary_text: When a young Amish boy is sole witness to a murder, policeman John Book goes into hiding in Amish country to protect him until the trial.

name: Elektra
summary_text: Elektra the warrior survives a near-death experience, becomes an assassin-for-hire, and tries to protect her two latest targets, a single father and his young daughter, from a group of supernatural assassins.
In 1947, Jackie Robinson becomes the first African-American to play in Major League Baseball in the modern era when he was signed by the Brooklyn Dodgers and faces considerable racism in the process.

name: My Fair Lady
summary_text: Snobbish phonetics Professor Henry Higgins agrees to a wager that he can make flower girl Eliza Doolittle presentable in high society.

name: Sling Blade
summary_text: Karl Childers, a simple man hospitalized since his childhood murder of his mother and her lover, is released to start a new life in a small town.

name: Open Season
summary_text: Boog, a domesticated 900lb. Grizzly bear, finds himself stranded in the woods 3 days before Open Season. Forced to rely on Elliot, a fast-talking mule deer, the two form an unlikely friendship and must quickly rally other forest animals if they are to form a rag-tag army against the hunters.

name: The Thomas Crown Affair
summary_text: A very rich and successful playboy amuses himself by stealing artwork, but may have met his match in a seductive detective.

name: Disaster Movie
summary_text: Over the course of one evening, an unsuspecting group of twenty-somethings find themselves bombarded by a series of natural disasters and catastrophic events.

name: Nymphomaniac: Vol. II
summary_text: The continuation of Joe's sexually dictated life delves into the darker aspects of her adulthood, obsessions and what led to her being in Seligman's care.

name: Cop Land
summary_text: The Sheriff of a suburban New Jersey community, populated by New York City police officers, slowly discovers the town is a front for mob connections and corruption.

name: Malcolm X
summary_text: Biographical epic of the controversial and influential Black Nationalist leader, from his early life and career as a small-time gangster, to his ministry as a member of the Nation of Islam.

name: Selma
summary_text: A chronicle of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.'s campaign to secure equal voting rights via an epic march from Selma to Montgomery, Alabama, in 1965.

name: Skyline
summary_text: Strange lights descend on the city of Los Angeles, drawing people outside like moths to a flame where an extraterrestrial force threatens to swallow the entire human population off the face of the Earth.

name: It's Complicated
summary_text: When attending their son's college graduation, a couple reignite the spark in their relationship. But the complicated fact is they're divorced and he's remarried.

name: Out of Sight
summary_text: A career bank robber breaks out of jail, and shares a moment of mutual attraction with a U.S. Marshal he has kidnapped.

name: Big Eyes
summary_text: A drama about the awakening of painter Margaret Keane, her phenomenal success in the 1950s, and the subsequent legal difficulties she had with her husband, who claimed credit for her works in the 1960s.

name: The Heartbreak Kid
summary_text: A newly wed man who believes he's just gotten hitched to the perfect woman encounters another lady on his honeymoon.

name: Uncle Buck
summary_text: Bachelor and all-round slob Buck babysits his brother's rebellious teenage daughter and her cute younger brother and sister.

name: Eddie the Eagle
summary_text: The story of Eddie Edwards, the notoriously tenacious British underdog ski jumper who charmed the world at the 1988 Winter Olympics.

name: The Quick and the Dead
summary_text: A female gunfighter returns to a frontier town where a dueling tournament is being held, which she enters in an effort to avenge her father's death.

name: Chicken Little
summary_text: After ruining his reputation with the town, a courageous chicken must come to the rescue of his fellow citizens when aliens start an invasion.

name: Biutiful
summary_text: A man dying of cancer tries his best to leave the world on his own terms.

name: Dead Silence
summary_text: A young widower returns to his hometown to search for answers to his wife's murder, which may be linked to the ghost of a deceased ventriloquist.

name: The Last House on the Left
summary_text: After kidnapping and brutally assaulting two young women, a gang unknowingly finds refuge at a vacation home belonging to the parents of one of the victims: a mother and father who devise an increasingly gruesome series of revenge tactics.

name: Ali G Indahouse
summary_text: Ali G unwittingly becomes a pawn in the Chancellor's plot to overthrow the Prime Minister of Great Britain. However, Ali is embraced by the nation as a voice of the youth, making the PM and his government more popular than ever.

name: Elephant
summary_text: Several ordinary high school students go through their daily routine as two others prepare for something more malevolent.

name: Here Comes the Boom
summary_text: A high-school biology teacher looks to become a successful mixed martial arts fighter in an effort to raise money to prevent extracurricular activities from being axed at his cash-strapped school.

name: Hustlers
summary_text: Inspired by the viral New York Magazine article, Hustlers follows a crew of savvy former strip club employees who band together to turn the tables on their Wall Street clients.

name: Clue
summary_text: Six guests are anonymously invited to a strange mansion for dinner, but after their host is killed, they must cooperate with the staff to identify the murderer as the bodies pile up.

name: Sing Street
summary_text: A boy growing up in Dublin during the 1980s escapes his strained family life by starting a band to impress the mysterious girl he likes.

name: Sweet November
summary_text: A workaholic executive, and an unconventional woman agree to a personal relationship for a short period. In this short period she changes his life.

name: xXx: Return of Xander Cage
summary_text: Xander Cage is left for dead after an incident, though he secretly returns to action for a new, tough assignment with his handler Augustus Gibbons.

name: Submarine
summary_text: 15-year-old Oliver Tate has two objectives: To lose his virginity before his next birthday, and to extinguish the flame between his mother and an ex-lover who has resurfaced in her life.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
summary_text: Four teenage mutant ninja turtles emerge from the shadows to protect New York City from a gang of criminal ninjas.

name: Turbo
summary_text: A freak accident might just help an everyday garden snail achieve his biggest dream: winning the Indy 500.

name: Piranha 3D
summary_text: After a sudden underwater tremor sets free scores of the prehistoric man-eating fish, an unlikely group of strangers must band together to stop themselves from becoming fish food for the area's new razor-toothed residents.

name: War
summary_text: An FBI Agent seeks vengeance on a mysterious assassin known as "Rogue" who murdered his partner.

name: Hitman: Agent 47
summary_text: An assassin teams up with a woman to help her find her father and uncover the mysteries of her ancestry.

name: Good Luck Chuck
summary_text: In order to keep the woman of his dreams from falling for another guy, Charlie Logan has to break the curse that has made him wildly popular with single women: Sleep with Charlie once, and the next man you meet will be your true love.

name: The Grapes of Wrath
summary_text: A poor Midwest family is forced off their land. They travel to California, suffering the misfortunes of the homeless in the Great Depression.

name: The Circle
summary_text: A woman lands a dream job at a powerful tech company called the Circle, only to uncover an agenda that will affect the lives of all of humanity.

name: Hostel: Part II
summary_text: Three American college students studying abroad are lured to a Slovakian hostel, and discover the grim reality behind it.

name: The Road to El Dorado
summary_text: Two swindlers get their hands on a map to the fabled city of gold, El Dorado.

name: The Fox and the Hound
summary_text: A little fox named Tod, and Copper, a hound puppy, vow to be best buddies forever. But as Copper grows into a hunting dog, their unlikely friendship faces the ultimate test.

name: The Neon Demon
summary_text: An aspiring model, Jesse, is new to Los Angeles. However, her beauty and youth, which generate intense fascination and jealousy within the fashion industry, may prove themselves sinister.
